data.name: Happiness Double Room

About the Game

ðŸ’—Happiness Double RoomðŸ’—



I've been abducted.
Abducted by... the sister I've known for years.........

Story of the game

What's the right choice? No matter how I think about it, any decision I make will eventually bring me to my wit's end.
But she told meâ€“â€“
It's ok to have chosen the wrong path, as long as you try your best to make it right, everything will be fine.

Towards the end of summer, while I was feeling suffocated from all of life's pressures, I met her again.
I let out all the stress that I accumulated for 4 years, and even contemplated leaving this world at one point.....
However, she took my hand and guided me towards a new life.

Game Elements

  • It's an interactive simulation
  • An impactful 100,000-word story filled with happiness.
  • Multiple storyline endings
  • A total of 27 CG scenes and over 300 animated pictures
  • There are 12 erotic CG scenes in total, of which 12 scenes are animated, and over 700 animated pictures

data.short_description: It's the end of summer, and you've been abducted by a sister you've known for a long time. Forget all your past troubles, distress and everything bothersome, just spend your time happily with Sister in the days to come!
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit OS
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work

!!Warning!!:This game adult content including full nudity, sexual scenes, suicide. please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
